title: Text Signal Utilization Strategies for Understanding Second Language Science Explanatory Texts [Self-Directed]

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic science concepts and intermediate+ English reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners require the ability to analyze English scientific texts when performing social sector job-linked projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the relationship between headings and underlining signals in scientific expository texts with 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate relationships between textual signals based on physical distance (close/distant) with 75% accuracy
Learners can represent signal-based text analysis results from project-based activities as visual maps with 90% completeness

resources: Digital Visual Mapping Tool (e.g., Miro, Coggle)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
